definition: to expose oneself/to be completely gone
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: A stich in time saves embarrassment.
sentences.chinese: 及時縫一針，免得再走光。

sentences.english: Enjoy it or remind the person?
sentences.chinese: 欣賞別人的走光還是好意提醒？

sentences.english: No matter how high the stars are playing, they all exposed unavoidably.
sentences.chinese: 看來不管多大牌的明星，都免不了走光啊。

sentences.english: The day was done, and the merrymakers had nearly all departed.
sentences.chinese: 一天已經過往，尋歡作樂的人們差未幾全走光了。

sentences.english: People standing on the other side of pavilion had gone.
The population here had cleared out a long time ago.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的居民很久以前就都走光了。

sentences.english: It's summer and it seems easy to see others expose themselves, of course, unintentionally.
sentences.chinese: 夏天到了，好像很容易看到走光的現象。

sentences.english: I thought everybody has already gone, but there are still few people anyhow.
sentences.chinese: 我以爲人都走光了，但還是有幾個人沒走。

sentences.english: The day was done, and the merrymakers had nearly all departed.
sentences.chinese: 一天已經過去，尋歡作樂的人們差不多全走光了。

sentences.english: He sits out the other guests.
sentences.chinese: 別的客人都走光了他還不走。

definition: protruding nipples or bulging penis (contours of intimate body parts visible through clothing)
dew point/(coll.) (of a woman) to expose one of the three areas (nipples and genitals)
old feminine garment, covering chest and abdomen

(TV or movie) blooper/continuity error/(theater) to flub one's lines/unintended exposure of a body part/to be exposed (of a scheme or trick)/to reveal sth one intended to conceal through a slip of the tongue/to blow one's cover
